name: decode
description: Converts `blob` to `VARCHAR`. Invalid UTF-8 is handled based on the error behavior argument. Can be 'strict' (default, fail), 'replace' to replace invalid characters with '?', or 'ignore' to skip invalid characters.

name: encode
description: Converts the `string` to `BLOB`. Converts UTF-8 characters into literal encoding.

name: from_base64
description: Converts a base64 encoded `string` to a character string (`BLOB`).

name: to_base64
description: Converts a `blob` to a base64 encoded string.
